title: Part One
desc: After the brutal rape and assault of a female jogger in Central Park, five African-American teenagers find themselves falsely accused of the crime.

title: Part Two
desc: The New York City police are shown mounting a conspiracy with prosecutors, to fudge timelines and to ignore conflicting evidence, in order to expedite a guilty verdict against five boys.

title: Part Three
desc: Antron, Yusef, Kevin and Raymond struggle being behind bars. They eventually are let out and have a hard time adjusting to life outside.

title: Part Four
desc: Korey is in adult prison and struggles with it. Eventually, the real truth comes out about what really happened. Events that had been ignored finally come to light.
